articles.title: Indian Bank FD interest rates revised for some tenures, check here - Times Now
articles.description: Deposits maturing in one year will fetch an interest rate of 5.25%, up from 5.10%. The interest rate on deposits with a maturity of over one year to less than 2 years has increased by 20 basis points, from 5.20% to 5.40%.
articles.content: India's first trans pilot forced to work as food delivery agent, DGCA declares him 'temporarily' unfit on medical grounds
